T01dsp1-2_u:0: Daśasāhasrikā Prajñāpāramitā evaṃ mayā śrutam: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma
T01dsp1-2_u:1: gṛdhrakūṭaparvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdham anekair bhikṣusahasraiḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:2: sarvair arhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravair niṣkleśair vaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñair ājāneyair mahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyair apahṛtabhārair anuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptair, ekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yadutāyuṣmantam ānandaṃ śaikṣaṃ srotaāpannaṃ;
T01dsp1-2_u:3: pañcamātraiś ca bhikṣuṇīśatair, upāsakair upāsikābhiś ca sārdhaṃ, sarvair
T01dsp1-2_u:4: dṛṣṭasatyair; anekasahasraiś ca bodhisattvair mahāsattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:5: sarvair dhāraṇīpratilabdhaiḥ samādhipratilabdhaiḥ śūnyatāvihāribhir animittagocarair avikalpitapraṇidhānaiḥ samatākṣāntipratilabdhair asaṃgapratibhāṇapratilabdhaiḥ sarvaiś ca pañcābhijñair ādeyavacanair akuhakair apagatajñānārthalābhasatkāracittair nirāmiṣadharmadeśakair gambhīradharmakṣāntipāragatair vaiśāradyaprāptair mārakarmasamatikrāntaiḥ sarvakaraṇāvaraṇavimuktair dharmanirdeśasaṃcitair asaṃkhyeyakalpasamārabdhapraṇidhānaiḥ smitamukhaiḥ pūrvābhilāpibhir vyapagatabhrūkuṭīmukhair anantapariṣadabhibhavanavaiśāradyasamanvāgatair anekakalpakoṭinirdeśaniḥsaraṇakuśalair māyāmarīcisvapnodakacandrapratibhāsākāśagandharvanagarapratibimbanirmāṇopamadharmādhimuktair apramāṇavaiśāradyasamanvāgataiḥ sarvasattvacittagatyadhimuktiparyāptikuśalaiḥ sarvasattvāpratihatacittair
T01dsp1-2_u:6: mahākṣāntisamanvāgatair yāthātmyāvatāraṇakuśalair anantabuddhakṣetravyūhaparigṛhītair asaṃkhyeyalokadhātugatabuddhānusmṛtisamādhisatatasamitābhimukhībhūtair aparimitabuddhādhyeṣaṇakuśalair nānādṛṣṭisamutthitakleśapraśamanakuśalaiḥ samādhivikrīḍanaśatasahasranirhārakuśalais, tadyathā bhadrapālena ca
T01dsp1-2_u:7: bodhisattvena mahāsattvena, ratnākareṇa ca, sārthavāhena ca, naradattena
T01dsp1-2_u:8: ca, varuṇadattena ca, indradattena ca, udāramatinā ca, viśeṣamatinā ca,
T01dsp1-2_u:9: vardhamānamatinā ca, amoghadarśinā ca, susaṃprasthitena cam,
T01dsp1-2_u:10: suvikrāntavikramiṇā ca, nityodyuktena ca, anikṣiptadhureṇa ca,
T01dsp1-2_u:11: ādityagarbheṇa ca, candragarbheṇa ca, anupamamatinā ca, avalokiteśvareṇa
T01dsp1-2_u:12: ca, mañjuśriyā ca, ratnamudrāhastena ca, nityotkṣiptahastena ca bodhisattvena, maitreyeṇa ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena, evaṃpramukhair
T01dsp1-2_u:14: tasyāṃ velāyāṃ bhagavān śakraṃ ca brahmāṇaṃ ca sarvāṃś ca lokapālān tejasābhibhūya tāsāṃ catasṛnāṃ parṣadāṃ purato virocamāna ṛddhyā nānāvidhaṃ vikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ saṃdarśayati sma. romakūpebhyo 'nekāni
T01dsp1-2_u:16: tena khalu samayenāyuṣmān śāradvatīputras tasyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatito 'bhūt
T01dsp1-2_u:17: saṃniṣaṇṇaḥ. sa tathāgatasyedṛśam ṛddhivikurvaṇaprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāta utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam
T01dsp1-2_u:18: uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃs tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantam etad avocat: sacen me bhagavān
T01dsp1-2_u:19: praśnavyākaraṇāyāvakāśaṃ kuryād ahaṃ bhagavantam kaṃcit pradeśaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:21: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat: tathāgataṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:22: praṣṭuṃ, śāradvatīputra, sadā kṛtāvakāśatvād yat kiṃcit tvaṃ tathāgataṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:23: praṣṭum icchasi, tat prccha, praśnaprativacanena cāhaṃ tava cittam
T01dsp1-2_u:25: evam ukta āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat: prajñāpāramitā,
T01dsp1-2_u:26: bhadanta bhagavan, prajñāpāramitety ucyate; katamā bhadanta bhagavan sā bodhisattvānaṃ prajñāpāramitā? kasya dharmasya pāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim
T01dsp1-2_u:28: evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmate śāradvatīputrāya sādhukāram adāt: sādhu,
T01dsp1-2_u:29: sādhu, śāradvatīputra, yat tvaṃ tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhānād evaṃ praśnaṃ pṛcchasi, sādhu; sundaras te saṃkalpaḥ, tena hi tvaṃ śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu
T01dsp1-2_u:31: evam astu bhadanta bhagavann ity āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavataḥ pratyaśroṣīt.
T01dsp1-2_u:32: bhagavāṃs tasyaitad avocat: śāradvatīputra prajñāpāramitā prajñāpāramitety
T01dsp1-2_u:33: ucyate yad idaṃ sarvadharmānabhiniveśaḥ. anabhiniviṣṭāḥ śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:35: āha: katame bhadanta bhagavaṃs te sarvadharmā yeṣu bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anabhiniviṣṭāḥ?
T01dsp1-2_u:36: bhagavān āha: sarvadharmāḥ śāradvatīputrocyante yaduta pañca skandhā,
T01dsp1-2_u:37: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvāry āryasatyāni, dvādaśa
T01dsp1-2_u:39: catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta bodhyaṅgāny,
T01dsp1-2_u:41: apraṇihitavimokṣamukhaṃ, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramānāni, catasra
T01dsp1-2_u:43: saṃjñā, daśānusmṛtayaḥ, ṣaṭ saṃjñākārā, dharmajñānam, anvayajñānaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:46: ca; evam eva savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir, avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhir, avitarkāvicāraḥ samādhir, anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam,
T01dsp1-2_u:47: ājñendriyam, ājñātāvīndriyam, aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni, daśa kṛtsnāyatanāny,
T01dsp1-2_u:48: aṣṭādaśa śūnyatā, daśa tathāgatabalāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ
T01dsp1-2_u:49: pratisaṃvido, mahāmaitrī, mahākaruṇā, aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāś ca;
T01dsp1-2_u:50: evam eva sarvajñatā, mārgākārajñatā, sarvākārajñatā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:51: pañcābhijñāḥ, pañca cakṣūṃṣi, dvātriṃśan mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāny, aśītir anuvyañjānāni ca. ete te sarvadharmā yeṣv anabhiniviṣṭā bodhisattvā
T01dsp1-2_u:52: mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
T01dsp1-2_u:53: tata āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat: katame bhadanta bhagavan pañca skandhāḥ, peyālaṃ yāvat katamāni dvādaśa
T01dsp1-2_u:54: pratītyasamutpādāṅgāni, katamāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, peyālaṃ yāvat katama āryāṣṭāṅgamārgaḥ, katamaṃ śūnyatāvimokṣamukhaṃ, peyālaṃ yāvat sarvākārajñatā, katamāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ, peyālaṃ yāvad aśītir anuvyañjanāni?
T01dsp1-2_u:55: [DsP_1] evam ukte bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat: pañca skandhā iti, śāradvatīputra, ucyante yaduta rūpaṃ, vedanā, saṃjñā,
T01dsp1-2_u:57: [DsP_2] tatra katamāni dvādaśāyatanāni? ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāni, ṣaḍ bāhyāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:59: tatra katamāni ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni? yaduta cakṣurāyatanaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:62: tatra katamāni ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni? yaduta rūpāyatanaṃ, śabdāyatanaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:63: gandhāyatanaṃ, rasāyatanaṃ, spraṣṭavyāyatanaṃ, dharmāyatanam. etāny ucyante ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:64: [DsP_3] tatra katama aṣṭādaśa dhātavaḥ? yaduta cakṣurdhātū, rūpadhātuś,
T01dsp1-2_u:68: manodhātur, dharmadhātur, manovijñānadhātuḥ. eta ucyanta aṣṭādaśa
T01dsp1-2_u:70: [DsP_4] tatra katamāni catvāry āryasatyāni? yaduta duḥkham āryasatyaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:71: samudaya āryasatyaṃ, nirodha āryasatyaṃ, mārga āryasatyam. etāny ucyante catvāry āryasatyāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:75: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ, sparśapratyayā vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā,
T01dsp1-2_u:76: tṛṣṇāpratyayam upādānam, upādānapratyayo bhavo, bhavapratyayā jātir,
T01dsp1-2_u:77: jātipratyayā jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopayāsāḥ. evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati.
T01dsp1-2_u:84: duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati. eṣa ucyate pratītyasamutpādo 'nulomaś ca pratilomaś ca.
T01dsp1-2_u:85: [DsP_6] tatra katamāni catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni? yaduta kāye kāyānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ, vedanāsu vedanānupaśyanāsmṛtyupasthānaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:88: [DsP_7] tatra katamāni catvāri samyakprahāṇāni? iha bodhisattvo mahāsattvo
T01dsp1-2_u:89: 'nutpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām anutpādāya chandaṃ janayati
T01dsp1-2_u:90: vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragrhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
T01dsp1-2_u:91: utpannānāṃ pāpakānām akuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ prahāṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
T01dsp1-2_u:92: anutpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇām utpādāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti;
T01dsp1-2_u:93: utpannānāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ sthitaye 'saṃpramoṣāya bhūyobhāvanāyai paripūraṇāya chandaṃ janayati vyāyacchate vīryam ārabhati cittaṃ pragṛhṇāti samyak pradadhāti. etāny ucyante catvāri samyakprahāṇāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:94: [DsP_8] tatra katame catvāra ṛddhipādāh? yaduta chandasamādhiprahāṇasaṃskārasamanvāgata ṛddhipādo,
T01dsp1-2_u:100: smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ, prajñendriyam. etāny ucyante pañcendriyāṇi.
T01dsp1-2_u:101: [DsP_10] tatra katamāni pañca balāni? śraddhābalaṃ, vīryabalaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:102: smṛtibalaṃ, samādhibalaṃ, prajñābalam. etāny ucyante pañca balāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:103: [DsP_11] tatra katamāni sapta bodhyaṅgāni? yaduta smṛtisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:105: prasrabdhisaṃbodhyaṅgaṃ, samādhisaṃbodhyaṅgam, upekṣāsaṃbodhyaṅgam. etāny ucyante sapta bodhyaṅgāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:109: [DsP_13] tatra katamac chūnyatāvimokṣamukham? yaduta sarvadharmasvalakṣaṇatāśūnyapratyavekṣaṇacittasthitir vimokṣamukham. etad ucyate śūnyatāvimokṣamukham.
T01dsp1-2_u:110: [DsP_14] tatra katamad animittaṃ vimokṣamukham? yaduta sarvadharmasvalakṣaṇatānimittapratyavekṣaṇacittasthitir animittavimokṣamukham. etad ucyate 'nimittaṃ vimokṣamukham.
T01dsp1-2_u:111: [DsP_15] tatra katamad apraṇihitaṃ vimokṣamukham? yaduta sarvadharmānabhisaṃskāre 'nabhisaṃskāracittasthitir
T01dsp1-2_u:113: [DsP_16] tatra katamāni catvāri dhyānāni? yaduta viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati;
T01dsp1-2_u:114: sa vitarkavicārāṇām upaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvad avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati;
T01dsp1-2_u:115: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan, sukhaṃ ca kāyena
T01dsp1-2_u:116: pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate smṛtimān sukhī sukhavihāry upekṣaka
T01dsp1-2_u:117: iti, niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati;
T01dsp1-2_u:118: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upekṣāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati. etāny ucyante catvāri dhyānāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:119: [DsP_17] tatra katamāni catvāry apramāṇāni? yaduta maitrī, karuṇā, muditā,
T01dsp1-2_u:124: [DsP_19] tatra katame 'ṣṭau vimokṣāḥ? yaduta rūpī rūpāṇi pasyaty, ayaṃ prathamo vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:125: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty, ayaṃ dvitīyo vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:126: śubham ity evādhimukto bhavaty, ayaṃ trtīyo vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:127: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ caturtho vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:128: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ pañcamo vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:129: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyātanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayaṃ ṣaṣṭho vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:130: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharaty,ayaṃ saptamo vimokṣaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:131: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharaty, ayam aṣṭamo vimokṣaḥ. eta ucyante 'ṣṭau vimokṣāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:132: [DsP_20] tatra katamā navānupūrvavihārasamāpattayaḥ? yaduta viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:133: vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ prathamā
T01dsp1-2_u:135: sa vitarkavicārāṇām upaśamād adhyātmaṃ saṃprasādāc cetasa ekotībhāvād avitarkam avicāraṃ samādhijaṃ prītisukhaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ dvitīyā samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:136: sa prīter virāgād upekṣako viharati smṛtimān saṃprajānan sukhaṃ ca kāyena pratisaṃvedayati yat tad āryā ācakṣate smṛtimān sukhavihāry upekṣaka iti niṣprītikaṃ tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ tṛtīyā samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:137: sa sukhasya ca prahāṇād duḥkhasya ca prahāṇāt pūrvam eva saumanasyadaurmanasyayor astaṃgamād aduḥkhāsukham upeksāsmṛtipariśuddhaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ caturthī samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:138: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānāṃ samatikramāt pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ pañcamī samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:139: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam iti vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ ṣaṣṭhī samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:140: sa sarvaśo vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramya nāsti kiṃcid ity ākiñcanyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ saptamī samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:141: sa sarvaśa ākiñcanyāyatanaṃ samatikramya naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīyam aṣṭamī samāpattiḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:142: sa sarvaśo naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanaṃ samatikramya saṃjñāvedayitanirodham upasaṃpadya viharatīyaṃ navamī samāpattiḥ. etā ucyante navānupūrvasamāpattayaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:143: [DsP_21] tatra katamā nava saṃjñāḥ? yaduta vidhmātakasaṃjñā,
T01dsp1-2_u:145: vikhāditakasaṃjñā, vikṣiptakasaṃjñā, asthikasaṃjñā, vidagdhakasaṃjñā. etā ucyante nava saṃjñāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:150: [DsP_23] tatra katame ṣaṭ saṃjñākārāḥ? yadutānityasaṃjñā, duḥkhasaṃjñā,
T01dsp1-2_u:151: anātmasaṃjñā, aśubhasaṃjñā, maraṇasaṃjñā, sarvaloke 'nabhiratisaṃjñā. eta ucyante ṣaṭ saṃjñākārāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:152: [DsP_24] tatra katamad dharmajñānam? yat pañcānāṃ skandhānāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:154: [DsP_25] tatra katamad anvayajñānam? yac chakṣur anityam iti jñānam, evam eva śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, mano, rūpaṃ, śabdo, gandho, rasaḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:155: spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmā anityā iti yaj jñānam idam ucyate 'nvayajñānam.
T01dsp1-2_u:156: [DsP_26] tatra katamat paracittajñānam? yat parasattvānaṃ parapudgalānāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:157: cetasaiva cetasi cetasikeṣu ca dharmeṣv avicikitsitaṃ jñānam idam ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:159: [DsP_27] tatra katamat saṃvṛtijñānam? yat pratipajjñānam idam ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:161: [DsP_28] tatra katamad duḥkhajñānam? yad duḥkhasyotpādasthitijñānam idam
T01dsp1-2_u:163: [DsP_29] tatra katamat samudayajñānam? yat samudayasya prahāṇajñānam idam ucyate samudayajñānam.
T01dsp1-2_u:164: [DsP_30] tatra kataman nirodhajñanam? yad duḥkhanirodhajñānam idam ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:166: [DsP_31] tatra kataman mārgajñānam? yad āryāṣṭāṅgamārgajñānam idam ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:168: [DsP_32] tatra katamat kṣayajñānam? yad rāgadveṣamohakṣayajñānam idam
T01dsp1-2_u:170: [DsP_33] tatra katamad anutpādajñānam? yad bhavagatyanutpadajñānam idam
T01dsp1-2_u:172: [DsP_34] tatra katamad yathābhūtajñānam? yat tathāgatasya sarvajñatājñānam
T01dsp1-2_u:174: [DsP_35] tatra katamad anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām anabhisamitānāṃ śraddhendriyaṃ, vīryendriyaṃ, smṛtīndriyaṃ,
T01dsp1-2_u:176: [DsP_36] tatra katamad ājñendriyam? yac chaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānām
T01dsp1-2_u:179: [DsP_37] tatra katamad ājñātāvīndriyam? yad aśaikṣāṇāṃ pudgalānāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:182: smṛtīndriyaṃ, samādhīndriyaṃ prajñendriyam idam ucyata ājñātāvīndriyam.
T01dsp1-2_u:183: [DsP_38] tatra katamaḥ savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ? viviktaṃ kāmair viviktaṃ pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharaty ayam ucyate savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhiḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:184: [DsP_39] tatra katamo vitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ? yā prathamadhyānasya dvitīyadhyānasya cāntarikāyam ucyate 'vitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhiḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:185: [DsP_40] tatra katamo 'vitarko 'vicāraḥ samādhiḥ? prathamaṃ dhyānam upādāya yāvan naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattir eṣa ucyate 'vitarko
T01dsp1-2_u:187: [DsP_41] tatra katamāny aṣṭāv abhibhvāyatanāni? yadutādhyātmaṃ rūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati parīttāni suvarṇadurvarṇāni, tāni rūpāṇy abhibhūya
T01dsp1-2_u:188: jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty, evaṃsaṃjñī bhavatīdaṃ prathamam abhibhvāyatanam;
T01dsp1-2_u:189: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati mahadgatāni
T01dsp1-2_u:190: suvarṇadurvarṇāni, tāni rūpaṇy abhibhūya jānāty abhibhūya paśyaty,
T01dsp1-2_u:192: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni, tadyathomāpuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bāraṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ nīlaṃ nīlavarṇaṃ nīlanidarśanaṃ nīlanirbhāsam, evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhasānīdaṃ tṛtīyam abhibhvāyatanam;
T01dsp1-2_u:193: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsāni, tadyathā karṇikārapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ vā bārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ pītaṃ pītavarṇaṃ pītanidarśanaṃ pītanirbhāsam, evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati pītāni pītavarṇāni pītanidarśanāni pītanirbhāsānīdaṃ caturtham abhibhvāyatanam;
T01dsp1-2_u:194: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsāni, tadyathā bandhujīvakapuṣpaṃ saṃpannaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:195: vā bārāṇaseyaṃ vastraṃ lohitaṃ lohitavarṇaṃ lohitanidarśanaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:196: lohitanirbhāsam, evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyati
T01dsp1-2_u:197: lohitāni lohitavarṇāni lohitanidarśanāni lohitanirbhāsānīdaṃ pañcamam abhibhvāyatanam;
T01dsp1-2_u:198: adhyātmam arūpasaṃjnī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty avadātāny avadātavarṇāny avadātanidarśanāny avadātanirbhāsāni, tadyathośanastārakayā varṇo 'vadāto
T01dsp1-2_u:199: 'vadātavarṇo 'vadātanidarśano 'vadātanirbhāsa, evam evādhyātmam arūpasaṃjñī bahirdhā rūpāṇi paśyaty avadātāny avadātavarṇāny
T01dsp1-2_u:201: sa sarvaśo rūpasaṃjñānaṃ samatikramat pratighasaṃjñānām astaṃgamān nānātvasaṃjñānām amanasikārād anantam ākāśam ity ākāśānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīdaṃ saptamam abhibhvāyatanam;
T01dsp1-2_u:202: sa sarvaśa ākāśānantyāyatanaṃ samatikramyānantaṃ vijñānam itī vijñānānantyāyatanam upasaṃpadya viharatīdam aṣṭamam abhibhvāyatanam.
T01dsp1-2_u:204: [DsP_42] tatra katamāni daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni? yaduta pṛthivīkṛtsnam,
T01dsp1-2_u:206: pītakṛtsnaṃ, lohitakṛtsnam, avadātakṛtsnaṃ, vijñānakṛtsnam. etāny ucyante daśa kṛtsnāyatanāni:
T01dsp1-2_u:207: sarvadhātūn pṛthivīdhātāv adhimucya sarvam api pṛthivīdhātur evaikadhātur
T01dsp1-2_u:209: sarvadhātūn abdhātāv adhimucya sarvam apy abdhātur evaikadhātur bhavati;
T01dsp1-2_u:210: sarvadhātūṃs tejodhātāv adhimucya sarvam api tejodhātur evaikadhātur
T01dsp1-2_u:212: sarvadhātūn vāyudhātāv adhimucya sarvam api vāyudhātur evaikadhātur
T01dsp1-2_u:214: sarvadhātūn ākāśadhātāv adhimucya sarvam apy ākāśadhātur evaikadhātur
T01dsp1-2_u:216: sarvadhātūn nīle dhimucya sarvam api nīlam eva bhavati;
T01dsp1-2_u:217: sarvadhātūn pīte 'dhimucya sarvam api pītam eva bhavati;
T01dsp1-2_u:218: sarvadhātūn lohite 'dhimucya sarvam api lohitam eva bhavati;
T01dsp1-2_u:219: sarvadhātūn avadāte 'dhimucya sarvam apy avadātam eva bhavati;
T01dsp1-2_u:220: sarvadhātūn vijñāne 'dhimucya sarvam api vijñānam evaikadhātur bhavati.
T01dsp1-2_u:221: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśanīlapītalohitāvadātavijñānaṃ sarvam apy ekam eva bhavatīty etāny ucyante
T01dsp1-2_u:222: nirantarakṛtsnaspharaṇād etāny ucyante kṛtsnāyatanāni. ekaikaṃ cāyatanaṃ sarvaṃ bhavati, tasmād ucyante kṛtsnāyatanānīti.
T01dsp1-2_u:229: tatra katamādhyātmaśūnyatā? ādhyātmikā dharmā ucyante, yaduta cakṣuḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:230: śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, manaḥ. tatra cakṣuś cakṣuṣā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. evam eva śrotraṃ, ghrāṇaṃ, jihvā, kāyo, mano manasā śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām
T01dsp1-2_u:231: upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'dhyātmaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:232: tatra katamā bahirdhāśūnyatā? bāhyā dharmā ucyante yaduta rūpaṃ, śabdo,
T01dsp1-2_u:233: gandho, rasaḥ, spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmāḥ. tatra rūpāṇi rūpaiḥ śūnyāny akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. evam eva śabdo, gandho, rasaḥ, spraṣṭavyaṃ, dharmā dharmaiḥ śūnyā
T01dsp1-2_u:234: akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate bahirdhāśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:235: tatra katamādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā? adhyātmabāhyā dharmā ucyante ṣaḍ ādhyātmikāny āyatanāni, ṣaḍ bāhyāny āyatanāni. tatrādhyātmikā dharmā ādhyātmikair dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ?
T01dsp1-2_u:236: prakṛtir asyaiṣā. bāhyā dharmā bāhyair dharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām
T01dsp1-2_u:237: upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'dhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:238: tatra katamā śūnyatāśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmaśūnyatā tayā
T01dsp1-2_u:241: tatra katamā mahāśūnyatā? pūrvā dik pūrvayā diśā śūnyākūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. evam eva dakṣiṇā, paścimā,
T01dsp1-2_u:242: uttarā dik, catasro vidiśas, tā aṣṭau diśa, uparisṭāddig upariṣṭāddiśā śūnyā, adhastāddig adhastāddiśā śūnyākūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate mahāśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:243: tatra katamā paramārthaśūnyatā? paramārtha ucyate nirvāṇam. tatra nirvāṇaṃ nirvāṇena śūnyam akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir
T01dsp1-2_u:245: tatra katamā saṃskṛtaśūnyatā? saṃskṛtam ucyate kāmadhātū, rūpadhātur,
T01dsp1-2_u:247: upādāya. evam eva rūpadhātū rūpadhātunā śūnyo, 'rūpadhātur arūpadhātunā
T01dsp1-2_u:248: śūnyaḥ; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate saṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:249: tatra katamāsaṃskṛtaśūnyatā? asaṃskṛtam ucyate yasya dharmasya notpādo, na
T01dsp1-2_u:250: sthitir, na nirodho, nānyathātvam. tatrāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam
T01dsp1-2_u:251: akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'saṃskṛtaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:252: tatra katamātyantaśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya notpāda upalabhyate
T01dsp1-2_u:253: 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'tyantaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:254: tatra katamānavarāgraśūnyatā? yasya dharmasya nāgatir upalabhyate
T01dsp1-2_u:255: 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'navarāgraśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:256: tatra katamānavakāraśūnyatā? yatra na kasyacid dharmasyāvakāro
T01dsp1-2_u:257: 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'navakāraśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:258: tatra katamā prakṛtiśūnyatā? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ prakṛtiḥ saṃskṛtānāṃ vāsaṃskṛtānāṃ vā sā na śrāvakaiḥ kṛtā, na pratyekabuddhaiḥ kṛtā, na bodhisattvaiḥ kṛtā, na buddhair bhagavadbhiḥ kṛtākūṭasthāvināśitām
T01dsp1-2_u:259: upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate prakṛtiśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:260: tatra katamā svalakṣaṇaśūnyatā? tatra rūpyalakṣaṇaṃ rūpam, anubhavalakṣaṇā
T01dsp1-2_u:262: vijānanalakṣaṇaṃ vijñānaṃ peyālaṃ yāvad yac ca saṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ yac cāsaṃskṛtānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sarva ete dharmāḥ svena svena lakṣaṇena śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ?
T01dsp1-2_u:264: tatra katamā sarvadharmaśūnyatā? sarvadharmā ucyante pañca skandhā,
T01dsp1-2_u:265: dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavo, rūpiṇo dharmā, arūpiṇo dharmāḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:266: saṃskṛtā dharmā, asaṃskṛtā dharmāḥ. tatra sarvadharmāḥ sarvadharmaiḥ śūnyā akūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate sarvadharmaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:267: tatra katamānupalambhaśūnyatā? sāpi sarvadharmānupalambho 'kūṭasthāvināśitām upādāya; tat kasmād dhetoḥ? prakṛtir asyaiṣā. iyam ucyate 'nupalambhaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:268: tatra katamābhāvaśūnyatā? yatra na kaścid bhāva upalabhyata iyam ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:270: tatra katamā svabhāvaśūnyatā? yaḥ sāṃyogikasya svabhāvābhāva iyam ucyate svabhāvaśūnyatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:271: tatra katamābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā? nāsti sāṃyogikasya kaścit svabhāvaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:273: punar aparaṃ śāradvatīputra bhāvo bhāvena śūnyo, 'bhāvo 'bhāvena śūnyaḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:274: svabhāvaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ, parabhāvaḥ parabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:275: tatra katamo bhāvaḥ? bhāva ucyate pañca skandhā yaduta rūpaṃ, vedanā,
T01dsp1-2_u:276: saṃjñā, saṃskārā, vijñānam. tatra bhāvo bhāvena śūnyaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:277: katham abhāvo 'bhāvena śūnyaḥ? abhāva ucyate 'saṃskṛtam. tatrāsaṃskṛtam asaṃskṛtena śūnyam, evam abhāvo 'bhāvena śūnyaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:278: kathaṃ svabhāvaḥ svabhāvena śūnyaḥ? yā sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā sā na jñānena kṛtā na darśanena kṛtā na kenacit kṛtā. ayaṃ svabhāva ucyate
T01dsp1-2_u:280: kathaṃ parabhāvaḥ parabhāvena śūnyaḥ? yotpādād vā tathāgatānām anutpādād vā tathāgatānāṃ sthitaivaiṣā dharmāṇāṃ dharmasthititā, dharmadhātur,
T01dsp1-2_u:281: dharmānavadyatā, tathatāviparyāsatathatānanyatathatā, bhūtakoṭir yaś cemeṣāṃ pareṇa śūnyaḥ parabhāvaḥ sa ucyate parabhāvena śūnyaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:282: ete śāradvatīputra te sarvadharmā yeṣv anabhiniviṣṭo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gataḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyate.
T01dsp1-2_u:285: [DsP_44] tato bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram avocat: tatra katamāni śāradvatīputra tathāgatasya daśa balāni? yaduta sthānaṃ sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty asthānam asthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
T01dsp1-2_u:286: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ karmaṇāṃ karmasamādānānāṃ ca sthānaśo hetuśo vipākaṃ yathābhūtaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:288: sa parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ nānādhimuktikatām anekādhimuktikatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti;
T01dsp1-2_u:294: āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtyopasaṃpadya viharati: kṣīnā me jātir, uṣitaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:295: brahmacaryaṃ, kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti. imāni śāradvatīputra tathāgatasya daśa balāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:297: samyaksaṃbuddhasya me pratijānata ime dharmā anabhisaṃbuddhā ity atra vata māṃ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi, nimittam etad aham asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto viharāmy abhayaprāpto vaiśāradyaprāpto
T01dsp1-2_u:298: viharāmy, udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānāṃ pratijānāmi, parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:299: nadāmi, brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā
T01dsp1-2_u:300: brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā loke saha
T01dsp1-2_u:302: kṣīṇāsravasya me pratijānata ima āsravā aparikṣīṇā ity atra vata māṃ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi, nimittam etad aham
T01dsp1-2_u:303: asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto viharāmy abhayaprāpto vaiśāradyaprāpto viharāmy,
T01dsp1-2_u:304: udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāmi, parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi,
T01dsp1-2_u:305: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā loke saha dharmeṇeti;
T01dsp1-2_u:306: ye ca mayāntarāyikā dharmā ākhyātās te pratisevato nālam antarāyāyeti,
T01dsp1-2_u:307: nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata ity atra vata māṃ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi, nimittam etad aham asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto viharāmy abhayaprāpto vaiśāradyaprāpto viharāmy, udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:308: pratijānāmi, parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi, brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy
T01dsp1-2_u:309: apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena va brāhmaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā loke saha dharmeṇeti;
T01dsp1-2_u:310: yā tena śrāvakebhyaḥ pratipad ākhyātāryanairyāṇikā nairvedhikā tatkarasya samyag duḥkhakṣayāya tāṃ pratipadyamāno na niryāyād samyag duḥkhakṣayāyeti, nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata ity atra vata māṃ śramaṇo va
T01dsp1-2_u:311: brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā kaścid vā punar loke saha dharmeṇa codayed iti nimittam etan na samanupaśyāmi, nimittam etad aham
T01dsp1-2_u:312: asamanupaśyan kṣemaprāpto viharāmy abhayaprāpto vaiśāradyaprāpto viharāmy,
T01dsp1-2_u:313: udāram ārṣabhaṃ sthānaṃ pratijānāmi, parṣadi samyak siṃhanādaṃ nadāmi,
T01dsp1-2_u:314: brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayāmy apravartitapūrvaṃ śramaṇena vā devena vā māreṇa vā brahmaṇā vā kenacid vā loke saha dharmeṇeti. etāny ucyante catvāri vaiśāradyāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:315: [DsP_46] tatra katamāś catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ? yaduta arthapratisaṃvid,
T01dsp1-2_u:316: dharmapratisaṃvin, niruktipratisaṃvit, pratibhānapratisaṃvit. etā ucyante catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:317: [DsP_47] tatra katamā mahāmaitrī? yā tathāgatasya sarvasattveṣu śatrau ca mitre ca samavṛtiteyam ucyate mahāmaitrī.
T01dsp1-2_u:318: [DsP_48] tatra katamā mahākarunā? niḥsattveṣu sattveṣu yo maitryatyāga iyam ucyate mahākaruṇā.
T01dsp1-2_u:319: [DsP_49] tatra katame 'ṣṭādaśāvenikā buddhadharmāḥ? yaduta nāsti tathāgatasya skhalitaṃ; nāsti ravitaṃ; nāsti muṣitasmṛtitā; nāsti
T01dsp1-2_u:320: nānātvasaṃjñā; nāsty asamāhitacittam; nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā; nāsti chandasya hānir; nāsti vīryasya hānir; nāsti smṛter hānir; nāsti samādher hānir; nāsti prajñāyā hānir; nāsti vimukter hānir nāsti vimuktijñānadarśanasya hāniḥ; sarvaṃ kāyakarma jñānapūrvaṃgamaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:322: sarvaṃ manaḥkarma jñānapūrvaṃgamaṃ jñānānuparivarti; atīte 'dhvany asaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate; anāgate 'dhvany asaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate; pratyutpanne 'dhvany asaṅgam apratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ pravartate. ima ucyante 'ṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:323: [DsP_50] tatrā katamā sarvajñatā? yad dvādaśasu śrāvakapratyekabuddhāyataneṣv ekāntikaṃ pudgalanairātmyajñānam iyam ucyate sarvajñatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:324: [DsP_51] tatra katamā mārgākārajñatā? yad bodhisattvasya triyānamārgajñasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānāsaṃtuṣṭasya
T01dsp1-2_u:326: [DsP_52] tatra katamā sarvākārajñatā? yat tathāgatasya sarvadharmāṇāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:327: sarveṣu traikālikākāreṣv avicikitsitaṃ jñānam iyam ucyate sarvākārajñatā.
T01dsp1-2_u:328: [DsP_53] tatra katamaḥ ṣaṭ paramitāḥ? yaduta dānapāramitā, śīlapāramitā,
T01dsp1-2_u:329: kṣāntipāramitā, vīryapāramitā, dhyānapāramitā, prajñāpāramitā. imā ucyante ṣaṭ pāramitāh.
T01dsp1-2_u:337: [DsP_55] tatra katamāni pañca cakṣūṃṣi? yaduta māṃsacakṣur, divyacakṣuḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:338: prajñācakṣur, dharmacakṣur, buddhacakṣuḥ. imāny ucyante pañca cakṣūṃṣi.
T01dsp1-2_u:340: yaduta bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ. tatrāyaṃ supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ: sakalābhyāṃ pādatalābhyāṃ bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśati tadyathā karaṇḍatalaṃ samatalāvalambanāt susama ādhāre 'vasthāpitaṃ sakalenādhastalena bhūmiṃ saṃspṛśaty evam eva bhagavān supratiṣṭhitapādaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:341: bhagavān samantanemikaḥ. tatrāyaṃ samantanemikah: adhastāt pādatalayoś cakre jāte sahasrāre sanabhike sanemike sarvākāraparipūrake;
T01dsp1-2_u:342: bhagavān mṛdutaruṇahastapādaḥ. tatreyaṃ mṛdutaruṇahastapādatā: tadyathā śālmalikambalaṃ karpāsakambalaṃ vā, yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
T01dsp1-2_u:343: bhagavān dīrghāṅguliḥ. tatreyaṃ dīrghāṅgulitā: tasya hastapādāṅgulayo 'tidīrghā, yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
T01dsp1-2_u:344: bhagavān jalahastapādah: tasya hastapādayor jālāny avanaddhāni, yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
T01dsp1-2_u:345: bhagavān āyatapārṣṇiḥ. tatrāyam āyatapārṣṇiḥ: tasya pādapāṛṣnitale āyate,
T01dsp1-2_u:347: bhagavān ucchaṅkhapādaḥ. tatreyam ucchaṅkhapādatā: āyatapārṣṇyā saṃprayoga āyatapārṣṇer gulphasya ca sandhir adṛśyatvena saṃyujyate, yādṛśam anyapuruṣāṇāṃ nāsti;
T01dsp1-2_u:348: bhagavān aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ. tatrāyam aiṇeyajaṅghaḥ: tasya jaṅghe anupūrvatanuke bhūtvā samyag anupūrve bhavataḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:350: sthitānavanatājānupralambabāhur: bhagavān sthitako 'navanatakāya ubhābhyāṃ pāṇitalābhyāṃ jānumaṇḍale parispṛśati saṃmṛśati;
T01dsp1-2_u:351: bhagavān kośagatavastiguhyaḥ. tatreyaṃ kośagatavastiguhyatā: tadyathā varagotra ājāneyo mahāhasty ājāneyo vāśvaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:353: tasyaikaikaromakūpebhya ekaikāni romāṇi jātāni nīlāni kuṇḍalāvartāni
T01dsp1-2_u:355: bhagavān ūrdhvāgraromaḥ. tatreyam ūrdhvāgraromatā: tasya śiraḥkāye keśaromāṇi jātāny ūrdhvam ākuñcitāni nīlāni kuṇḍalāvartāni
T01dsp1-2_u:360: evaṃ surūpaḥ sudarśanas, tasmād ucyate suvarṇavarṇaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:361: bhagavān saptotsadaḥ. tatreyaṃ saptotsadatā: tasya dvayoḥ padayor dvāv utsadau surūpau sudarśanau parivṛddhamāṃsalohitau; evam eva dvayor
T01dsp1-2_u:362: hastayor dvāv utsadau surūpau sudarśanau parivṛddhamāṃsalohitau, dvayor aṃsayor dvāv utsadau, kandharopari caika utsadaḥ surūpaḥ sudarśanaḥ parivṛddhamāṃsalohitaḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:366: bhagavān nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalaḥ. tatreyaṃ nyagrodhaparimaṇḍalatā: yāvān āyāmatas tāvān vistārato, yāvān vistāratas tāvān āyāmataḥ;
T01dsp1-2_u:371: bhagavān rasāgravān. sa ṛjukaṇṭhanāḍiko 'jihmam asaṅgaṃ gilanasamartho 'sti;
T01dsp1-2_u:372: bhagavān prabhūtatanujihvaḥ. tatreyam prabhūtatanujihvatā: mukhāj jihvāṃ nirṇamayyobhe nāsikāvivare ubhe cakṣurvivare ubhe karṇavivare spṛśati
T01dsp1-2_u:380: bhagavato bhruvor antara ūrṇā jātā karpāsavat komalā
T01dsp1-2_u:391: buddhā bhagavantaḥ śrīmanto buddhimanto, darśanīyā, nātyāyatavadanā,
T01dsp1-2_u:401: buddhā bhagavantas tanujihvā, abhinīlaromāḥ, śuciromā, viśālanetrāḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:407: sattvānuśāsakās; teṣāṃ vāg anukūlavartiparṣado bahir na nirgacchati;
T01dsp1-2_u:411: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ hiṅgulamanaḥśilācīnapiṣṭavaiḍūryatāmrakiṭṭavarṇair likhitānīva lakṣaṇāni. etany ucyante 'śītir anuvyañjanāni.
T01dsp1-2_u:412: [DsP_58] tata āyuṣmān śāradvatīputro bhagavantam etad avocat: saced bhadanta bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmeṣv anabhiniviṣṭās,
T01dsp1-2_u:413: tena bodhisattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthaṅ na samanupaśyanti yaduteme dharmāḥ kuśalā ime dharmā akuśalā, ime dharmā vyākṛtā ime dharmā avyākṛtā, ime dharmā laukikā ime dharmā lokottarā, ime dharmāḥ sāsravā ime dharmā anāsravā, ime dharmāḥ saṃskṛtā ime dharmā asaṃskṛtā, ime dharmāḥ sādhāraṇā
T01dsp1-2_u:414: ime dharmā asādhāraṇā ity, asaṃpaśyamānāś ca kathaṃ bodhimārgaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:416: evam ukte bhagavān ayuṣmantaṃ śāradvatīputram etad avocat: yad api śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyanti tat saṃvṛtitaḥ,
T01dsp1-2_u:418: āha: kathaṃ bhagavan saṃvṛtitaḥ sat paramārthato nāsti?
T01dsp1-2_u:419: [DsP_59] bhagavān avocat: yasmin kāle śāradvatīputra bodhisattva evaṃ cintayati: tatra katame kuśalā laukikā dharmā iti, sa evaṃ cintayati: ete kuśalā laukikā dharmā yaduta pitṛjñatā, mātṛjñatā, śramaṇyatā,
T01dsp1-2_u:424: vikhāditakasaṃjñā, vikṣiptakasaṃjñā, asthikasaṃjñā, vidagdhakasaṃjñā; evam eva catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayo,
T01dsp1-2_u:428: [DsP_60] tatra katame 'kuśalā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati: ete
T01dsp1-2_u:431: krodha, upanāho, mrakṣaḥ, pradāso, vihiṃserṣyā, mātsaryaṃ, māna iti.
T01dsp1-2_u:432: [DsP_61] tatra katame 'vyākṛtā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati:
T01dsp1-2_u:433: ete 'vyākṛtā dharmā yadutāvyākṛtāni kāyakarmāṇy, avyākṛtāni vākkarmāṇy,
T01dsp1-2_u:434: avyākṛtāni manaḥkarmāṇy, avyākṛtāni catvāri mahābhūtāny, avyākṛtāni
T01dsp1-2_u:435: pañcendriyāṇy, avyākṛtāḥ pañca skandhā, dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavo,
T01dsp1-2_u:437: [DsP_62] tatra katame lokottarā dharmā iti cintayitvā sa evaṃ cintayati:
T01dsp1-2_u:438: ete lokottarā dharmā yaduta catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni, catvāri
T01dsp1-2_u:439: samyakprahāṇāni, catvāra ṛddhipādāḥ, pañcendriyāṇi, pañca balāni, sapta
T01dsp1-2_u:441: anājñātamājñāsyāmīndriyam, ājñendriyam, ājñātāvīndriyaṃ, savitarkaḥ savicāraḥ samādhir, avitarko vicāramātraḥ samādhir, avitarko 'vicāraḥ
T01dsp1-2_u:442: samādhir, adhyātmaśūnyatā yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatā, tathāgatasya daśa balāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ pratisaṃvido, mahāmaitrī,
T01dsp1-2_u:444: [DsP_63] tatra katame sāsravā dharmāḥ? traidhatukaparyāpannāḥ pañca skandhā, dvādaśāyatanāny, aṣṭādaśa dhātavaś, catvari dhyānāni, catvāry
T01dsp1-2_u:445: apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattaya ete ucyante sāsravā dharmāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:446: [DsP_64] tatra katame 'nāsravā dharmāḥ? catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni peyālaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:448: [DsP_65] tatra katame saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ? yaduta kāmadhātū, rūpadhātur,
T01dsp1-2_u:449: arūpadhātur, evam eva pañca skandhāś, catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry
T01dsp1-2_u:450: apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaś, catvāri smṛtyupasthānāni peyālaṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:451: yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā, ete saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ.
T01dsp1-2_u:452: [DsP_66] tatra katame 'saṃskṛtā dharmāḥ? yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ notpādo, na
T01dsp1-2_u:453: sthitir, na nirodho, nānyathātvam, evam eva rāgakṣayo, dveṣakṣayo,
T01dsp1-2_u:454: mohakṣaya, evam eva dharmasthitir, dharmatā, dharmadhātur,
T01dsp1-2_u:457: [DsP_67] tatra katame sādhāraṇā dharmāḥ? yaduta catvāri dhyānāni, catvāry
T01dsp1-2_u:458: apramāṇāni, catasra ārūpyasamāpattayaḥ, pañcābhijñā, ete pṛthagjanaiḥ saha
T01dsp1-2_u:460: [DsP_68] tatra katame pṛthagjanaiḥ sahāsādhāraṇā dharmāḥ? saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣikā dharmā, daśa balāni, catvāri vaiśāradyāni, catasraḥ
T01dsp1-2_u:461: pratisaṃvidas, trīṇi vimokṣamukhāni yāvad aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmā eta
T01dsp1-2_u:463: [DsP_69] yad api śāradvatīputra bodhisattvāḥ saṃvṛtitaḥ sarvadharmān evaṃ pṛthak paśyamānāḥ paramārthato nābhiniviśanti, katham anabhiniviṣṭāḥ?
T01dsp1-2_u:464: tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo māyānirmitāṃ caturaṅginīṃ senāṃ
T01dsp1-2_u:465: dṛṣṭvā, yaduta hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ, tatra senāstīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo gharmārto nānāvidhāṃ marīcikām ūrmivac calantīṃ dṛṣṭvedaṃ jalam iti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣaḥ svapne nānāvidhāni rūpāṇi dṛṣṭvā vibuddhaḥ san teṣām rūpam astīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śaradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa udake candraṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra candro 'stīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa indrajālaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra vastutve nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api sarvadharmāṇāṃ vastutve nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit pūruṣo māyayākāśe carann
T01dsp1-2_u:466: api tatrākāśo 'stīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣaḥ pratiśrutkāṃ śrutvā tatra śabdo 'stīti
T01dsp1-2_u:467: nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā sarvadharmān
T01dsp1-2_u:468: pṛthak paśyamānā api nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣo gandharvanagaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tatra nagaram astīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api
T01dsp1-2_u:469: nābhiniviśanti; tadyathā śāradvatīputra kaścit puruṣa ādarśe mukhapratibimbaṃ dṛṣṭvaitan mukham astīti nābhiniviśaty, evam eva śāradvatīputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvadharmān pṛthak paśyamānā api
T01dsp1-2_u:470: nābhiniviśanti, dharmeṣv anabhiniviṣṭāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pāraṃ gatāḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhyante.
